Package org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file

Interface Summary
FileResource Describes a resource for accessing file objects.
FileTask Describes a file related task.
FileTaskService Describes a service for performing file tasks.
FileTaskSpec  
 

Class Summary
FileHandle Represents a handle to a file.
FileLocation Describes the location of a file object.
FileResourceType Describes a type of file resource.
FileSet Provides a base implementation for (all) file sets
FileSetType Describes a type of file set.
FileTaskType Describes a type of file task
FileType  
FileUtil This utility class simplifies the use of the file package by providing convenient methods for methods commonly used by other portlet services.
 

Exception Summary
FileException Describes a file related exception.
FileTaskException Describes a file task related exception.
